Message:
An angel’s miracle
can grant any wish.

But, in exchange,
one must give up
the very thing
they treasure most.

For me, what I hold
most dear is obvious.

I dare not even think of losing
my memories of my master.
It would be a fate
worse than death.

Using the powers of an angel,
a servant of God,
to defy the very laws of life
ordained by their master
is preposterous.

Even if I enact a miracle,
my wish cannot possibly
be granted just by losing
my memories of my master...
I know that. I know, but...

Even still...for 200 years...
I haven’t forgotten a single day
we spent together...

I’ve always, always kept
my master in my heart...

How could I ever
possibly give up on him...?
